experience.title: Finance Intern
experience.description: 1. Planning, Studying, and collecting data to determine costs of business activity such as COGS,Inventory, Warehousing & Logistics cost, Labour cost, Marketing spends, IT spends etc.2. Analyzing data collected, performing variance analysis between actual and budgeted costs to assistmanagement in decision making or other financial initiatives.3. Recording information (results) for use in controlling expenditures and preparing reports for themanagement.4. Making Estimates of new and proposed costs.
experience.description_html: 1. Planning, Studying, and collecting data to determine costs of business activity such as COGS,Inventory, Warehousing & Logistics cost, Labour cost, Marketing spends, IT spends etc.2. Analyzing data collected, performing variance analysis between actual and budgeted costs to assistmanagement in decision making or other financial initiatives.3. Recording information (results) for use in controlling expenditures and preparing reports for themanagement.4. Making Estimates of new and proposed costs.
